Class ProductController

java.lang.Object
com.meli.controller.ProductController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/products") public class ProductController extends Object

  • Constructor Details

    • ProductController

      public ProductController(ProductService productService)

  • Method Details

    • getAllProducts

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Product>> getAllProducts()
      Get ALL products. GET /products This endpoint is for general viewing (e.g., home page).

    • getProductsBySeller

      @GetMapping("/seller/{sellerId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Product>> getProductsBySeller(@PathVariable int sellerId)
      Get products belonging to a specific seller. GET /products/seller/{sellerId}

    • getProductById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Product> getProductById(@PathVariable int id)
      Get a single product by ID (no seller scope here, for general product viewing if needed) This can be used by consumers or for internal lookups. GET /products/{id}

    • addProduct

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> addProduct(@RequestBody Product product, @RequestHeader("X-User-Id") int loggedInUserId)
      Add a new product. POST /products Requires X-User-Id header for validation.

    • updateProduct

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateProduct(@PathVariable int id, @RequestBody Product product, @RequestHeader("X-User-Id") int loggedInUserId)
      Update an existing product. PUT /products/{id} Requires X-User-Id header for validation.

    • deleteProduct

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteProduct(@PathVariable int id, @RequestHeader("X-User-Id") int loggedInUserId)
      Delete a product by ID. DELETE /products/{id} Requires X-User-Id header for validation.

    • buyProduct

      @PostMapping("/{id}/buy") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> buyProduct(@PathVariable int id, @RequestBody BuyRequestDTO buyRequest)
      Endpoint to handle a single product purchase (from detailProduct.html). POST /products/{id}/buy Receives the quantity to purchase using BuyRequestDTO.

    • purchaseProducts

      @PostMapping("/purchase") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> purchaseProducts(@RequestBody List<BuyRequestDTO> purchaseItems)
      Endpoint to handle a bulk purchase (from cart.html). POST /products/purchase Receives a list of BuyRequestDTOs.
